# macrocharts

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of macrocharts is to help macroeconomics students to understand effects of the IS-LM model.

## Installation

You can install the development version of macrocharts from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("m-pereira/macrocharts")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how create a IS-LM :

```{r example}
## load the package
#library(macrocharts)
## create a shiny app with the 
#chart_IS_LM()
```
